DOC.brief_summary: The aim study twofold : ( 1 ) develop innovative approach study brain glucose metabolism use functional diffusion weight imaging ( DWI ) BOLD fMRI human ; ( 2 ) evaluate effect short peripheral electrical stimulation ( PES ) treatment brain brain-stem target , associate control food intake energy expenditure , response glucose stimulus , healthy volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Peripheral Electrical Stimulation ( PES ) Brain Response Glucose Stimuli
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteer Age 1865 year old . Body mass index 18 25 kg/m2 Capable give informed consent Pregnancy , nurse Permanent pacemaker Metal prosthesis Skin disease Claustrophobia History neurological disorder
